name: compress
description: Compress a file or a directory with files.

params.name: format
params.description: The format in which you want to compress the files.

params.name: source
params.description: Path (relative or absolute) to the file or directory you want to compress.

params.name: target
params.description: Path (relative or absolute) including the name, where you want to save the compressed output-file.

params.name: includeBaseFolder
params.description: Compress the directory or just the content of the directory.

examples.title: Compress a file
examples.description: Compress the file "example.txt" to a zip-file.
